data.title: Andy Roberts Music, News and Writings
data.meta_description:
News of gigs, recordings and shows with stories from my life, past and present as singer-songwriter IOW.  

Expect one email on Wednesday (may be a podcast or video replay) and one longer piece of writing on Sunday.  
Images often included. Click to read Andy Roberts Music, News and Writings, a Substack publication with hundreds of subscribers.
data.text:
What is here, now?

This “About” page is about my little site here and the email list integral to it. For more information about myself, you might take a look at my Bio page.

Hi, there!

This Andy Roberts Newsletter has been going here since January 2022 and there are more than 100 posts in the archive. When you subscribe, you get new ones sent to your inbox so you never miss an update, download link, advance notice of gigs, livestreams or anything else.

Stay up-to-date

You won’t have to worry about missing anything. Every new edition of my newsletter goes directly to your email inbox, or substack app if you prefer.

What to expect

Currently the schedule is for a brief email going out each Wednesday, giving notice of any gigs coming up at the weekend, and a more thoughtful, longer piece of writing, news, video or music post which goes out on a Sunday. So a maximum of two emails per week, sometimes fewer. That can change and evolve as time passes though.

Join the After Party crew

Become part of a community of people who share a common interest and good taste! As an email subscriber you will also be entitled to post comments here or reply to the emails in order to have your say and join in the fun.
